creator: wearsnova
descriptionHtml:
ZORDAI is a smartwatch (ZORDAI 7 Pro Max) companion app.
1. A mobile application with message reminder, alarm clock, sedentary / drinking reminder, exercise step counting, calories and other functions, providing 24-hour exercise monitoring and health services.

2.The APP can push incoming calls, sms, and application notifications to the watch, so permissions such as call records and sms are required for normal use.

3. Record GPS movement, support running, cycling, walking and mountain climbing, support background operation, and record movement time, distance, pace, step frequency, step number and other data.
descriptionShort: ZORDAI is an app for smart watches.
title: ZORDAI

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Support several login methods: One-click login,mobile verification code login,etc.
2. Support Nucleic Acid Code synchronization.
3. Fix other issues
